snippet: The Internet giant said it made a second attempt to settle an antitrust inquiry it faces in Europe over accusations that it abuses its dominance in Internet search and advertising.
abstract: Google says it made second attempt to settle three-year-old antitrust inquiry it faces with European Union over accusations that it abuses its dominance in Internet search and advertising.
lead_paragraph: The Internet giant said it made a second attempt to settle an antitrust inquiry it faces in Europe over accusations that it abuses its dominance in Internet search and advertising.

headline.main: Google Makes New Offer to Settle Its European Union Antitrust Case
headline.print_headline: Google Makes New Offer to Settle Its European Union Antitrust Case
